member.name: RSOP_TARGET
member.summary: TheRSOP_TARGET structure contains computer and user information required by theGenerateGroupPolicy function.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.pwszAccountName
member.summary: Pointer to the account name of the computer or the user.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.pwszNewSOM
member.summary: Pointer to the new domain or organizational unit that is the location for the account identified by the pwszAccountName member. This member can be NULL.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.psaSecurityGroups
member.summary: Pointer to a SAFEARRAY that contains a proposed list of new security groups. This member can be NULL. For more information about security groups, seeFiltering the Scope of a GPO andHow Security Groups are Used in Access Control.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.pRsopToken
member.summary: Pointer to an RSOPTOKEN to use with the and the functions.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.pGPOList
member.summary: Pointer to a structure containing a linked list of GPOs.

member.name: RSOP_TARGET.pWbemServices
member.summary: Specifies the WMI services pointer to the namespace to which the planning mode policy data should be written.
